tl.GUI

Class TGUIView

  • java.lang.Object
    • tl.GUI.TGUIView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TGUIHorizontalView, TGUIVerticalView

    public abstract class TGUIView
extends java.lang.Object
    TGUIView is an abstract class that provides the basic functionality for TGUIVerticalView and TGUIHorizontalView.
    TGUIViews set properties for each component in the view, and positions/stretches/organises them to meet the size of its parent.
    If the parent is set to null, then the TGUIView uses the TGUIManager's properties instead.
    Since:
    2.1
    Author:
    Callum Nichols
    See Also:
    TGUIVerticalView, TGUIHorizontalView

      void addComponent(TGUIComponent component)
      Adds a component to the view to be organised.
      It will throw a TGUIException if component is null (note that is actually catches its own throw, but it will still exit the application gracefully).

      Removes the components from the view.

      void toggleStretching()
      Toggles component stretching off and on (off by default).

    • Constructor Detail

      • TGUIView

        public TGUIView(TGUIComponent parent,
        boolean onAdd)
        TGUIView's constructor. Used to set its parent on construction.
        Parameters:
        parent - - The parent of this TGUIView. Can be set to null.
        onAdd - - Whether or not the view should re-organise every time a new component is added (true re-organises on add).
        See Also:
        addComponent(TGUIComponent)

    • Method Detail

      • setParent

        public void setParent(TGUIComponent parent)
        Sets the parent of the view. This will re-organise each component.
        Parameters:
        parent - - The parent of this TGUIView. Can be set to null.

      • addComponent

        public void addComponent(TGUIComponent component)
        Adds a component to the view to be organised.
        It will throw a TGUIException if component is null (note that is actually catches its own throw, but it will still exit the application gracefully).
        Parameters:
        component - - The component to add. It must not be null.

      • organise

        public void organise()
        Used to manually re-organise the view.

      • setSpacing

        public void setSpacing(int spacing)
                throws TGUIException
        Sets the spacing in pixels between each component.
        Parameters:
        spacing - - The spacing in pixels. If less than 0, it will throw a TGUIException.
        Throws:
        TGUIException

      • toggleStretching

        public void toggleStretching()
        Toggles component stretching off and on (off by default).

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns:
        Returns the number of components in the view.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes the components from the view.
